page.title: 18ADDERLEY IN THE FUTURE
page.content: There are lots of things we would like in the village - like a park or a Leisure Centre just to make Adderley less boring. We would like more people in Adderley. There would be enough room by the church for a Leisure Centre, and seeing as B.M.X competitions are popular now it would be nice if we could have a racing track. However, if we had these things in the field next to the church the Rector might not be very pleased. We could do with a few more shops especially food shops. In the winter it can be difficult to get to Market Drayton because of the snow. We have an old Railway track in Adderley and there is a lot of wild life down there. It would make a super Nature Reserve.
